• If you are worried about 
breastfeeding when you are 
out and about, wear a t-shirt 
or a vest top and a cardigan 
so that you can lift your top 
up from the waist to feed. 
If you are worried about 
showing your tummy you 
can wear a belly band or a 
second vest.
